docs.title: Welcome to Arctyk Projects
docs.text: This documentation covers all projects developed by the Arctyk team, excluding Arctyk ITSM.

docs.title: Project Categories
docs.text:
• Obsidan.md plugins
  • SharePoint web parts
  • Power Platform apps and automations
  • Integration (connectors for 3rd party apps)
  • Custom apps

For ITSM-related content, visit Arctyk Docs.

docs.title: About Arctyk Projects
docs.text:
ArctykDev is the development branch of the Arctyk ecosystem — focused on experimentation, innovation, and internal tooling.

These docs serve as a unified reference for non-ITSM Arctyk projects.

For ITSM-related content, visit Arctyk Docs.

docs.title: Custom Apps

docs.title: Integrations
docs.text: The Integrations section documents APIs and connectors between Arctyk projects and external systems (e.g., GitHub, SharePoint, Power Platform).

docs.title: Obsidian Calendar Events
docs.text:
A lightweight Obsidian plugin that displays events from an iCal (ICS) feed directly inside Obsidian.

Designed for seamless integration with external calendar feeds such as Outlook, Google Calendar, or SharePoint calendar ICS links.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• View upcoming events from multiple iCal (.ics) feeds inside Obsidian
  • Events automatically grouped and sorted by day
  • Pin today's events to the top of the event list
  • Click on event to add it to daily note
  • Configurable date range to control how far ahead events are displayed
  • Works with most themes
  • Simple settings panel for configuration
  • Works entirely offline once data is fetched — no external dependencies beyond the Obsidian API
  • Can be installed manually or with the BRAT plugin

docs.title: GitHub
docs.text: Main repo: obsidian-calendar-events

docs.title: Obsidian Project Planner
docs.text: A project planner for ObsidianMD based on Microsoft Premium Planner. Includes grid view, board view and timeline view.

docs.title: Current Version
docs.text: • Version 0.1.0-Dev.0

docs.title: Features
docs.text: Feature Description Version Grid View Table view of tasks and sub tasks v0.5.0 Board View Kanban view of buckets for organizing tasks v1.0.0 Timeline View Gantt style view of all tasks and subtasks v2.0.0 Task Details A details panel for managing all task options v0.5.0 Multiple Projects Support for multiple projects v0.5.0 Dashoard Dashboard page with simple statistics v1.0.0

docs.title: Grid View
docs.text:
Feature Description Parent/subtasks Parent/subtask grouping and tracking Drag and drop Drag tasks and subtasks using the task grabber Inline editing Edit tasks inline with one click Quick menu
  • Open task details window
  • Add new task
  • Make subtask or promote
  • Delete task
Column sorting Click a column header to sort Column sizing Resize columns by dragging edges Task filtering Filter tasks using drop-down menus On-time/Overdue Visually identifies whether tasks are on-time or overdue

docs.title: Roadmap
docs.text: Project roadmap. All version goals are subject to change.

docs.title: Grid View
docs.text:
• Add Import/Export tasks to CSV - v0.8.0
  • Feature testing - v0.1.0 - v0.5.0
  • Stable release - v0.5.0

docs.title: Task details
docs.text:
• Add Complete checkbox to top of panel - v0.6.0
  • Drag and drop checklists to task details - v0.5.0

docs.title: Board View
docs.text:
• Initial design prototype - v0.7.0
  • Initial working prototype - v0.8.0

docs.title: Chart/timeline View
docs.text:
• Initial design prototype - v1.5.0
  • Initial working prototype - v1.6.0

docs.title: Project
docs.text:
• Support for multiple projects - v0.5.0
  • Task assignment - TBD
